short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your Start Page and New Tab page with live backgrounds, shortcuts and widgets; like weather, wallpapers and much more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension changes your new tab and has a default search of Yahoo. Note: we do not change your default search provider. The search box on the new tab page uses Yahoo search. 

FEATURES: 
★ Fully customizable start page
★ Create many pages to group shortcuts and widgets
★ Use HEX color codes for custom backgrounds
★ Dozens of HD background images
★ Upload your own custom backgrounds
★ Animated and Interactive backgrounds
★ Dark Mode
★ Add Widgets, like weather, notes, calculator, and much more!
★ Add & Move Shortcuts anywhere on the page
★ Select from a shortcut library, including over 100+ popular sites
★ Customize the shortcut icons by choosing a library of icons and colors
★ Open links or search results in new tabs
★ Hide shortcuts or the search box (for the minimalist) 
★ Quick access to your email provider!

★ NEW ★  Includes Backup and Restore

"It's like a desktop experience for your browser!" – Anonymous 

-------------------------------------------------------

You can remove or disable the extension at any time.

Disclosure: We provide Yahoo search by default as one of our affiliate providers.
